info.title: Nadybot API
info.description: This API provides access to Nadybot functions in a REST API

name.description: Name of this option for displaying

value.description: Which value does this option represent?

numeric_value.description: Higher value means fewer rights. Use this to sort on

enabled.description: Some ranks only work if a module is enabled

actee.description: The person the actor is interacting with. Not set if not applicable

sub_source.description: The value for the sub-source, or null if none

permission_set.description: The permission set to map $source to

cmd_prefix.description: The prefix that triggers a command if it's the first letter

cmd_prefix_optional.description: Is the prefix required to interpret the msg as command or optional

unknown_cmd_feedback.description: Shall we report an error if the command doesn't exist

source.description: The name/mask of this command source If the name contains an asterisk wildcard, it represents a mask of possible sources, e.g. aotell(*)

mappings.description: A list of permission set mappings this command source maps to

where.description: The channel for which to apply these colors or null for all

via.description: Only apply this color if the event was routed via this hop

tag_color.description: The 6 hex digits of the tag color, like FFFFFF

text_color.description: The 6 hex digits of the text color, like FFFFFF

where.description: The channel for which to apply these, or null for all

via.description: Only apply these settings if the event was routed via this hop

render.description: Whether to render this tag or not

format.description: The format what the text of the tag should look like

description.description: Description of the module or null if none

enabled.description: Is the (sub-)command enabled on this permission-set

subcommands.description: A list of subcommands for this command. Subcommands can have different rights, but cannot be enabled without the command itself being enabled. *

access_level.description: The access level you need to have in order to be allowed to use this command in this channel

enabled.description: Can this command be used in this channel?

description.description: What is supposed to happed when this event occurs?

enabled.description: Is the event handler turned on?

type.description: The type of this setting (bool, number, options, etc)

options.description: A list of predefined options to pick from

editable.description: Is this a fixed setting (like database version) or can it be changed?

description.description: A description of what this setting is for

time.description: Unix timestamp when this was created

name.description: Name of the character who created the entry

sticky.description: Set to true if this is pinned above all unpinned news

deleted.description: Set to true if this is actually deleted

id.description: The internal ID of this news entry

uuid.description: The UUID of this news entry

charid.description: The character ID as used by Anarchy Online

first_name.description: The character's first name (the name before $name)

name.description: The character's name as it appears in the game

last_name.description: The character's last name (the name after $name)

level.description: What level (1-220) is the character or null if unknown

breed.description: Any of Nano, Solitus, Atrox or Opifex. Also empty string if unknown

gender.description: Male, Female, Neuter or an empty string if unknown

faction.description: Omni, Clan, Neutral or an empty string if unknown

profession.description: The long profession name (e.g. "Enforcer", not "enf" or "enfo") or an empty string if unknown

prof_title.description: The title-level title for the profession of this player For example "The man", "Don" or empty if unknown.

ai_rank.description: The name of the ai_level as a rank or empty string if unknown

ai_level.description: AI level of this player or null if unknown

org_id.description: The id of the org this player is in or null if none or unknown

org.description: The name of the org this player is in or null if none/unknown

org_rank.description: The name of the rank the player has in their org (Veteran, Apprentice) or null if not in an org or unknown

org_rank_id.description: The numeric rank of the player in their org or null if not in an org/unknown

dimension.description: In which dimension (RK server) is this character? 4 for test, 5 for RK5, 6 for RK19

head_id.description: Which head is the player using

pvp_rating.description: Numeric PvP-rating of the player (1-7) or null if unknown

pvp_title.description: Name of the player's PvP title derived from their $pvp_rating or null if unknown

last_update.description: Unix timestamp of the last update of these data

Player.description: This represents the data the bot stores about a player in the cache and database

afk_message.description: The AFK message of the player or an empty string

main_character.description: The name of the main character, or the same as $name if this is the main character of the player

online.description: True if this player is currently online, false otherwise

allOf.description: This represents a single player in the online list

org.description: All players online in the org

private_channel.description: All players online in the private channel

OnlinePlayers.description: This is the list of all players considered to be online by the bot

id.description: Internal ID of this history entry

actee.description: Optional, the person the actor is acting on

action.description: The action the actor is doing

organization.description: Name of the organization this action was done in

permission_set.description: The permission set to map $source to

symbol.description: The symbol that triggers a command if it's the first letter

symbol_optional.description: Is the symbol required to interpret the msg as command or optional

feedback.description: Shall we report an error if the command doesn't exist

description.description: The optional description, explaining when it occurs

layer.description: Which relay stack layer does this represent?

incoming.description: Allow sending the event via this relay?

outgoing.description: Allow receiving the event via this relay?

layers.description: The individual layers that make up this relay

events.description: A list of events this relay allows in- and/or outbound

name.description: The name of this news tile

description.description: A description what this news tile shows

example.description: An example what this could look like if there was data

bot_name.description: Name of the bot character in AO

superadmins.description: Name(s) of the character(s) running the bot, empty if not set

org.description: Name of the org this bot is in or null if not in an org

org_id.description: ID of the org this bot is in or null if not in an org

bot_version.description: Which Nadybot version are we running?

php_version.description: Which PHP version are we running?

os.description: Which operating system/kernel are we running?

db_type.description: Which database type (mysql/sqlite) are we using?

current_usage_real.description: Current memory usage in bytes including allocated system pages

peak_usage_real.description: Peak memory usage in bytes including allocated system pages

type.description: Type of the reply from the proxy

send-modes.description: Modes the proxy supports for sending messages

buddy-modes.description: Modes the proxy supports for adding buddies

supported-cmds.description: Commands the proxy supports in general

rate-limited.description: Set when the proxy enforces rate-limits

default-mode.description: The mode the proxy will use when sending proxy-default

started-at.description: Unix timestamp when the proxy was started

using_chat_proxy.description: Is the bot using a chat proxy for mass messages or more than 1000 friends

proxy_capabilities.description: If the proxy is used, this describes in detail what the proxy supports

uptime.description: Number of seconds since the bot was started

active_commands.description: Number of active commands in this channel
Number of commands activated for each channel

active_help_commands.description: Number of active help texts for commands

buddy_list_size.description: How many characters are currently on the friendlist

max_buddy_list_size.description: Maximum allowed characters for the friendlist

priv_channel_size.description: How many people are currently on the bot's private channel

org_size.description: How many people are in the bot's org? 0 if not in an org

charinfo_cache_size.description: How many character infos are currently cached?

chatqueue_length.description: How many messages are waiting to be sent?

name.description: The name of the public channel

id.description: The ID the game uses for this channel

class.description: The class of the channel (OOC, towers, etc.)

misc.description: Information not fitting any other category

channels.description: Which channels is the bot listening to

get.description: Get a list of configured access levels

200.description: A list of all access levels

get.description: Query entries from the audit log

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: No more than this amount of entries will be returned. Default is 50

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many entries to skip before beginning to return entries

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Show only entries of this actor

parameters.name: actee
parameters.description: Show only entries with this actee

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Show only entries with this action

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Show only entries from before the given timestamp

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Show only entries from after the given timestamp

post.description: Send a message to the org chat

get.description: Get a list of command sources

200.description: A list of command sources and their mappings

get.description: Get details for a specific command source

200.description: The command source and its mappings

get.description: Get mappings for a specific command source

204.description: A new command mapping was created

put.description: Modify mapping for a specific command source

delete.description: Delete mapping for a specific command source

204.description: The source mapping was deleted successfully

get.description: Get mappings for a specific command source

put.description: Modify mapping for a specific command source

delete.description: Delete mapping for a specific command sub-source

204.description: The sub-source mapping was deleted successfully

post.description: Execute a command, result is sent via websocket

requestBody.description: The command to execute as typed in

get.description: List all hop colors
List all hop formats
Get a list of available modules to configure

200.description: A list of modules to configure

get.description: Get a list of available commands for a module

200.description: A list of all command and possible subcommands this module provides

get.description: Get the description of a module
Get a list of available events for a module

200.description: A list of all events and their status for this module

get.description: Get a list of available settings for a module

200.description: A list of all settings for this module

get.description: Get a list of all news

204.description: The news item was created successfully

get.description: Get a single news item by id

200.description: The news item it is now

requestBody.description: The new data for the item

get.description: Get a list of all people online in all linked channels
Query entries from the org history log

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: No more than this amount of entries will be returned. Default is 50

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many entries to skip before beginning to return entries

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Show only entries of this actor

parameters.name: actee
parameters.description: Show only entries with this actee

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Show only entries with this action

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Show only entries from before the given timestamp

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Show only entries from after the given timestamp

get.description: Get a list of permission sets
Get a permission set by its name
Get a list of saved profiles
View a profile
List all relay layers
List all relay layers
List all relay protocols
List all relay transports
List all relays
Get a single relay
Get a single relay's event config

put.description: Get a single relay's event config

patch.description: Get a single relay's event config

requestBody.description: The changed event configuration for one event

get.description: Get a relay's status

200.description: The status message of the relay

get.description: Get the value of a setting

201.description: The new setting was stored successfully

409.description: There is already a setting stored

415.description: You tried to pass more than just a simple string

requestBody.description: The data you want to store

204.description: The new setting was stored successfully

415.description: You tried to pass more than just a simple string

requestBody.description: The data you want to store

204.description: The new setting was deleted successfully

409.description: No setting found for that key

get.description: Get the currently configured startpage layout

requestBody.description: The new order for the tiles

get.description: List all news tiles
Get system information
